item.title: Managing your JavaScript Dependencies with RequireJS
item.author: ottog2486@gmail.com (Otto Giron)
item.description: RequireJS is a module loader for JavaScript. RequiresJS is based on the AMD (Asyncronous Module Definition) API specification, which provides a mechanism for defining and consuming modules. When you require or use a module, it will be retrieved asynchronously and cached at the time you need it, that improves performance since you don’t need to load all your dependencies (JavaScript files) at the same time.
